Class AnimalMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • AnimalMonitor

  • public class AnimalMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
    Monitor counts of different types of animal. Sightings are recorded by spotters.
    Version:
    2016.02.29 (imperative)
